stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (mpsc_select #27800)This implementation, while likely sufficient, is unsafe and likely to be error prone. At some point in the future this module will likely be replaced, and it is currently unknown how much API breakage that will cause. The ability to select over a number of channels will remain forever, but no guarantees beyond this are being made

apiDescription: The "receiver set" of the select interface. This structure is used to manage a set of receivers which are being selected over.
